sentences.en: Man: We're ready. She'd like to have Grilled Pacific Swordfish.
sentences.cn: 男: 我们已经准备好了. 她想要一份烤的太平洋旗鱼.

sentences.en: Most of the income of the island is from three fishes: cod, halibut, and swordfish.
sentences.cn: 岛上大部分的收入得自鳕鱼 、 大比目鱼和旗鱼等三种鱼类.

sentences.en: The swordfish got entangled in the fishing net.
sentences.cn: 箭鱼被捕鱼网给卷入了.

sentences.en: The swordfish, when wounded, jump out of the water and thrash about.
sentences.cn: 剑鱼受伤后, 会跳出水面,身子不断摆动.

sentences.en: Thick, firm Atlantic swordfish steak grilled to perfection and garnished with crispy almond sliver and tomato.
sentences.cn: 厚而紧实的大西洋箭鱼烤至恰到好处,并点缀着清脆的杏仁和番茄.

trans.tran_en: a large fish with a very long pointed upper jaw
